course_title: The Solid Earth: A Dynamic Planet

101.comments: EOSC 111 is recommended. EOSC 110 will involve regular online synchronous lectures (2 per week), with opportunities to participate in class activities and discussions with your instructors and your peers. Instructor and TA office hours and tutorial times will be determined based on a student survey at the start of the semester.

V01.comments: This section is reserved for UBC Vantage College students only.

description: Earth's origin, composition, structure, and natural resources. Plate tectonics as the driving force for volcanism, mountain building, and earthquakes.  Imaging Earth's interior. Environmental geoscience and sustainability. (Consult the Credit Exclusion list for the Faculty of Science section of  the Calendar.)
